The intern signed this check with RSA-3, thinking it was secure. Can you forge a valid signature? Here is the signed message: 0xbe6eb873df3b150cea678046ea72dbebc5ea5970c9f0505b89bbc9485774b662ac952011f0d55044c80f4d51a2dcd83356e08bb16353f69eb42216cd27dc24f

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{1vxkqaqu}

hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
